data.current_summary: Calculates the number of miles earned for every frequent flyer program.
data.summary_suggestion: Calculate mileage earnings across frequent flyer programs
data.description_suggestion: Calculates mileage earnings for a given flight itinerary across all supported frequent flyer programs. Accepts an Itinerary object containing flight segment details (origin, destination, airline, cabin class, etc.). Returns a CalculateItineraryResult containing earning calculations for each program, including base miles, bonus multipliers, and total credited miles. Requires API key authentication.
data.reasoning: Original summary is somewhat vague about scope. Missing description entirely makes it impossible for AI agents to understand inputs, outputs, or authentication requirements. Added details about expected input schema (Itinerary), output schema (CalculateItineraryResult), what calculations are performed, and security requirements. This enables AI agents to determine when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_summary: Lists all supported frequent flyer programs.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all supported frequent flyer programs
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all supported frequent flyer programs available for mileage earning calculations. Returns an array of Program objects, each containing program details such as name, airline, earning rules, and program identifiers. No authentication required. Use this operation to discover available programs before calculating mileage earnings for specific itineraries.
